I don't know why  some people are having problems with this torrent. I'm also not sure about the solution. 

I would recommend you click the torrent links and try to "save as" to see if you can download the torrent to your hard drive directly then try to open it with your torrent software. 

Obviously most people are not having a problem, I hope we can find a solution for those who are having troubles.

For some reason the URL tracker was udp:// instead of http://  

It works fine since I went in and edited the tracker profile to get it set correctly. It's not the first TPB torrent that's come in that way, but its the first time I noticed any problem.

For reference, I'm using:

http://vip.tracker.thepiratebay.org:80/announce

as the tracker URL and it's not working fine.

A wonderful collection, LYD; thanks for sharing.  As celebrations of the beauty of femininity go, I haven't seen better in a long time.  Well done for all the hard work you've put in to build this collection up.

A note of caution for downloaders though.  There are some topless young ladies in this collection, a few of whom are obviously under 18.  Although nobody is being harmed, none of the pictures are overtly sexual, and all of them are every bit as beautiful as the ones of the older girls, the nonsensical laws in some less enlightened countries could send you to jail for having them.  Until such a time as sanity prevails and these laws are changed, please be careful.
